seo.title: Monterosso Attractions 2025 | Beaches, Old Town & Giant Statue
seo.description: Discover what to see in Monterosso. Sandy beaches, historic old town, Il Gigante statue, and medieval churches.

body.title: Sights & Attractions
body.subtitle: From sandy beaches to medieval towers. Discover the largest and most diverse village in Cinque Terre.

features.title: Sandy Beaches
features.description: Only sandy beaches in Cinque Terre. Both free and paid sections.

features.title: Il Gigante
features.description: 14-meter Neptune statue on the rocks. Historic landmark.

features.title: San Giovanni Battista
features.description: 13th-century Gothic church with striped marble facade.

features.title: Aurora Tower
features.description: Medieval watchtower dividing old and new town.

features.title: Old Town
features.description: Narrow medieval streets and hidden piazzas.

features.title: Fegina Promenade
features.description: Beachfront walk with cafes and stunning views.
